programme.title: Kids' Planet - Hope and Faith - EP124
programme.desc: In this episode, we will learn about the values of Faith and Hope. We will discover that hope is a value that allows us to believe that something positive will happen. Faith is having confidence in someone or something. When we have faith in people, we help them to believe in themselves. You must trust in yourself and know that you are capable of achieving it!

programme.title: Mellodees - Jack & Jill - EP11
programme.desc: Fetch a pail of water with Dee to keep his little fish happy at home.

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - Just Say Snow! - EP116
programme.desc: The Secret Millionaires Club are on winter break where they find that the owner of Snowy Lodge named Jerry Crenshaw had retired and a new owner from Switzerland named Lucas has redecorated the hotel to make it feel like home. With no visitors to the lodge and no available part time jobs due to lack of visitors, Jones gets a job to be a poster boy for the lodge's advertisement and meets Lucas' son Phillipe who secretly doesn't know how to ski.

Music has the magic of uniting people because almost everyone shares a love for music!

programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force relentlessly tracks notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list.

programme.title: Patagonia - Series 1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Over six stunning episodes, expert local crews join an international team of the world's best wildlife filmmakers to explore uncharted territory, discover new species and tell an urgent environmental story. Patagonia travels the 2000-mile length and Atlantic-to-Pacific breadth of this vast, enigmatic region to illuminate five distinct terrains: majestic mountains, the far south, dense forests, hostile deserts and breath-taking fjordlands.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure - EP 2
programme.desc: Experience the Emerald Isle as you've never seen it before, as we join Donal and his faithful dog Max on a culinary road trip around Ireland, discovering the people, places and ingredients that make it magical. In each episode, Donal will be cooking up a local dish, from fresh lobster rolls on the dramatic coastline of West Cork to oyster shooters in Galway's picturesque oasis.

programme.title: Weather Gone Viral S7 - EP 5
programme.desc: From whirling tornadoes to torrential rains, to harrowing hurricanes, Weather Gone Viral gives viewers unprecedented access to some of the most insane meteorological moments from around the world. Featuring videos of the most extreme and destructive weather conditions, firsthand accounts, and professional meteorologists sharing tales from the front lines, viewers get to experience the fury of Mother Nature.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals For Every Day - EP 2
programme.desc: Join Jamie at home with his family in Essex for delicious, family-focused food for real life, every day In this brand new series, we join the nation's favourite chef at his country home, where he's cooking up tasty, healthy recipes from his new book 7 Ways: Easy Ideas for Every Day of the Week. Inspired by his own home cooking, based around simple, crowd-pleasing family meals that are creative but pressure-free, Jamie mostly uses 8 ingredients or less, with plenty of versatility.

Music has the magic of uniting people because almost everyone shares a love for music!

programme.title: Yeti Tales
programme.desc: Join Us in Yeti Tales !

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. Many things can happen in Misha’s world; especially exciting adventures, mysterious investigations, hilarious competitions... all with a feeling of close friendship.

programme.desc: Get ready to dance and sing-along to music-filled episodes

programme.desc: Get ready to watch Talking Tom and Friends at their cutest! Mini in size, but massive in fun, the Minis check out the day-to-day world of the friends we all know and love where they do the most ordinary things in the most extraordinary ways.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo the Wildlife Ranger introduces the secrets and wonders of nature and wildlife around us and kickstarts a curiosity and passion for nature in kids. With engaging missions and adventures, kids have fun while learning positive lessons!

programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. Bino and Fino have many adventures where, with the help of their friend Zeena the Magic Butterfly, they discover and learn things about the world.

programme.title: Horaci the Inuit

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.
